title: Total brand value major sports leagues ( NFL , MLB , NBA & NHL ) 2013
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in each Sports League on the y axis.
The maximum Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) 9131.8 is found at Sports League National Football League and the minimum is found at National Hockey League where Sports League is 1560.4.
The highest Sports League National Football League has 7571.4 more Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) than the lowest Sports League National Hockey League.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in each Sports League on the y axis.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is appeared to be the highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in each Sports League on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sports League in the x axis and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in the y axis.
The Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is highest at Sports League National Football League and lowest at Sports League National Hockey League.
The second highest Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is appeared to be the Sports League Major League Baseball.
The maximum Sports League National Football League has got 5.85 times higher Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) than the minimum Sports League National Hockey League.

The Sports League National Football League has the highest Brand value (in million U.S. dollars), followed by Major League Baseball, and National Basketball Association. Down to the Sports League National Hockey League which is the lowest.
The lowest value 1560.4 at National Hockey League is almost 2.05 times smaller than the average value 4458.9.
Summing up the values of all Sports Leagues, we get total 17835.6.
